content: जन् {c4c} <ab>A.</ab> (जायते, जज्ञे, अजानि-अजनिष्ट, जनितुं, जात; {%<ab>pass.</ab>%} जन्यते or जायते) {@--1@} To be born or produced (with <ab>abl.</ab> of source of birth); अजनि ते वै पुत्रः <ls>Ait. Br.</ls>; <ls>Ms. 1. 9</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">3. 39</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 3.">41</ls>; प्राणाद्वायुरजायत <ls>Rv. 10. 90. 12</ls>; <ls>Ms. 10. 8</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">3. 76</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">1. 75.</ls> {@--2@} To rise, spring up, grow (as a plant &c.). {@--3@} To be, become, happen, take place, occur; अनिष्टादिष्टलाभेऽपि न गतिर्जायते शुभा <ls>H. 1. 6</ls>; रक्तनेत्रोऽजानि क्षणात् <ls>Bk. 6. 32</ls>; <ls>Y. 3. 226</ls>; <ls>Ms. 1. 99.</ls> {@--4@} To be possible, applicable &c. {@--5@} To be born or destined for anything. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (जनयति) {@--1@} To give birth, beget, cause, produce. {@--2@} To cause, occasion.
